attributes.action: Referendum required before UK agreeing to a new country joining the EU in future and if EU extends of its policies (like for defence, momentary) to UK
attributes.additional_details: It is good that UK currently opted out of EU foreign policy, security, taxation, defence and the Euro monetary currency, but for how long?  What if the EU imposes a new country (e.g. Turkey) upon UK as part of the EU?  In may be chaotic as there can be potental conflicts amongst believers of different religions & culture. The EU is not a united country but a trading economic bloc of countries so there is no need for a constitution. A United States of Europe is doomed to failure, like the former USSR.
